title: Non-recipe pages included in crawled URL list
description:
~100+ URLs in the crawl list aren't actual recipe pages. Categories include:
- Category/index pages: kingarthurbaking.com/recipes/muffins-popovers, food.com/recipe/all/popular
- Roundup/listicle posts: onceuponachef.com '50 best chicken recipes', howsweeteats.com 'game-day-recipes'
- Blog posts without recipes: kingarthurbaking.com blog posts, loveandoliveoil.com product pages
- Lifestyle posts: howsweeteats.com 'a week in the life'

The is_recipe_url() filter in URL discovery could be improved to exclude these patterns.
